name: pieppiep
short_description:
It's an e-learning game for the age group of 8-12.
This game will help children to learn the traffic rules.

Game contains walk and cycle mode, with two initial maps. On passing the objective with obaying all the traffic rules game rewards user. Game give tips of traffic rules on the go also.Game will provide some hints if the user is going wrong.

Game is developed in C with limited graphics facility, in which user has to finish some objectives like some work given by her mommy or papa.
summary: It's a game that helps children to obey traffic rules
